basic.Peptide Name: P20(derived from E2 envelope protein of GB virus C)
basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from E2 envelope protein of GB virus C)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.20718496]HIV-1:inhibition of gp41-induced cell-cell fusion in CEM-174 cells(IC50=347.6 μM);inhibition of HIV(HXB2) infection in TZM-bl Cells(IC50=70.1 μM);inhibition of HIV(BAL) infection in TZM-bl Cells(IC50=125.5 μM);inhibition of HIV(69-7) infection in TZM-bl Cells(IC50=111.1 μM).
